item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI pushes ahead with for-profit plans and talks to give Altman a stake
2. Saudi Arabia ready to abandon $100 crude target to take back market share
3. Is a stealth bomber-shaped plane the future of air travel?
4. Trump attacks Kyiv for ‘refusing to make a deal’ to end war
5. [Opinion] Why eight Tokyo minutes from office to metro is too long
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
